subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tim Thomas stopped 19 shots for his first N.H.L. playoff shutout to lead the Boston Bruins to a victory over the Carolina Hurricanes in Game 5 of their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Tim Thomas stopped 19 shots for his first N.H.L. playoff shutout to lead the Boston Bruins to a victory over the Carolina Hurricanes in Game 5 of their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
